availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Mount Vernon, Rockcastle County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born farmer.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Mount Vernon, p. 35.

Find A Grave, Entry for Albert Owens (1839-1913), Find A Grave Memorial # 6971613, Old Freedom Cemetery, Brodhead, Rockcastle County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=OW&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=1401&GRid=6971613& (accessed 18 May 2017).
